name: Slide Stories: Neko's Journey
description: Follow Nina and her cat, Neko, on a journey through beautiful places in this relaxing and minimalist slide puzzle game.

name: Devoul: Curse of the Soulless
description: Devoul: Curse of the Soulless is a metroidvania style game set in a dark and corrupted world. Follow the adventures of Gebriel, a demon hunter, and Lani his ghost sidekick, while they explore the cursed castle Cambriala seeking the infamous vampire lord Raizer.

name: Cube Paradox
description: Cube Paradox is a retro platform game, go through the "single level" of the game as quickly as possible so that you can get a recording of it, or will the increasing obstacles prevent you from recording it?

name: Rise of the Atman
description: A Fantasy, Open-World, RPG of adventure, cost, and reward, where the player determines their choices and then chooses between them. Champion the forsaken and forge them into a nation, or watch it all burn and take everything for yourself.

name: Find Girl
description: Find girl is a simple puzzle game. The game includes all kinds of beautiful girls, waiting for us to find them!

name: Demon Purge Saga
description: A tale of revenge and intolerance guided by faith. Father Emmet starts his quest on the city of Parabollam to purge all the evil. An unique game mixing exorcism elements with match-3 battles.

name: Guilty Guardians
description: A modern dungeon crawler RPG in the pixel-art style of games of the 90s. You control a group of mercenaries who are ready for money to go in search of ancient artifacts in creepy dungeons, closed laboratories, ice stations and other dangerous places of the split worlds of the United Universe.

name: Here I Come
description: Stay alive in a deadly reality show.

name: The Evolving World: Catalyst Wake
description: After three apocalyptic events known as the "Catalysts" devastated the world, what remains of humanity must fight for peace if they are to survive.

name: 黃易群俠傳M
description: Sin descripción

name: Arenix
description: Arenix is a brutal endless top-down shooter with thousands of monsters and even more bullets. Death is inevitable, but how long can you survive?

name: Zenorost Realm
description: A fantasy-life simulator in procedurally-generated worlds where every creature has its own role and where you can be whatever you want

name: BakuMari
description: Crazy game with the building of towers in the most incredible situations. Ex-villain Explosion tries to redeem herself and helps a mysterious cubie.

name: Puzzle Angry Cat
description: In Puzzle Angry Cat you have to collect images of evil cats. By selecting the image parts with the cursor, you add up the overall image, which will come to life in the end. Evil cats won't let you get bored, after building the image, they will show how dissatisfied with what is happening.

name: Izbot 2
description: Izbot 2 is a fast paced precision platformer that will test your mettle and will leave you always wanting to complete just one more level. Use your cat like reflexes to guide our hero Izbot through buzz saws, lasers and a ton of pointy spikes to save the metropolis from the evil Bedlor once more.

name: Heart of Metal
description: In each game, two teams need to fight against each other.When one team’s health declines to zero. They will not die, the gunner and the pilot will be detached.At that moment the pilot needs to find the gunner and re-attach and return to battle.

name: Quest for Cathrinite
description: An action game where you collect powerful ores, gems, and runes. Forge a variety of weapons, and form potent combinations to defeat an increasingly powerful horde of enemies while on your quest to find the priceless Cathrinite ore.

name: My Dear Frankenstein
description:
“Come. While the darkness is still welcoming...”

“My Dear Frankenstein” is a point-and-click adventure visual novel produced by the indie Japanese circle Number7 and localised by Moonchime Studios.

As a newborn little monster, the protagonist will have to explore the City of Shipberry at night and search for the pieces of his heart that got scattered all around it. Players will get to delve into universal themes like life, friendship and grief through his experiences in this emotional quest.

Content warnings: suicide, cruelty, references to death and the occult.

name: World Puzzle
description: World Puzzle - a classic puzzle with several levels of difficulty, more than a dozen different author's drawings in the style of pixel art, limited time and limit of lives, all for the perfect game in a relaxing manner.

name: Alien Cat 2
description:
In this top-down puzzle game you will help cute black cat to save the universe.
You should collect all spaceship parts on levels and reach the portal. But this is not so easy as it seems. Traps is everywhere. Mines, stakes trap, be careful to avoid all of them. And by the way look carefully for your clones, they can get on trap as well. The clones mimic all Cat movement, but they stop if they stuck on the wall. Avoid mines and enemies, and push the buttons to close the stakes traps.

name: VRDJ
description: Hello! If you are a DJ or you dream of becoming one, this game is for You! VRDJ is a realistic DJ equipment simulator (two players and mixer). This game was created in collaboration with famous djs, and we were able to reproduce all the experience of the DJ equipment and the creation of mixes.

name: Marbles: Razor's Wrath
description: Marbles: Razor's Wrath is a single-player platformer game based on finding collectable items. You will face enemies and use the core slam mechanic in order to defeat enemies and overcome challenges. Control the old technology left behind in the post-apocalyptic world to break barriers in the way!

name: Business Shark
description: You will have to develop your city, watch over expenses, strive for higher tax revenues, meet the needs of your residents by producing the right products for them

name: Chaos Kart
description: Chaos Kart is the first team-based racing brawler game from Baka Bros Entertainment. Master your favorite powerful champions with unique abilities and personalities. Make epic plays, secure kills, and battle your way to the finish line.

name: Space Porter
description: Space Porter is a 2D top-down puzzle game made in hand-drawn graphics.

name: Park Walk
description: Park walk is a shooting first person game, which tells the story of adventure in the wild. When you are surrounded by zombies on the way to adventure, you need to pick up all kinds of guns and kill zombies!

name: Orc Invasion
description: Orc Invasion - protect your queen, protect your kingdom!

name: Raid on the Zone
description: Fight in a furious battle against "The Zone", a mysterious terrorist group hell-bent on destroying the world. Cripple their defenses with your dual-prop helicopter and massive arsenal of weaponry in this retro-inspired homage to arcade games of the 80's.

name: Wire Flying Maid 2
description: As you know, the elegant maid never walks. Instead she flies.

name: Magical Waifus Academy
description: Have your way with more than TWO DOZEN different species of monstergirls with fully handcrafted animations. Fun fact: this game plays 100% one-handed.

name: Torchway
description: A lamplighter's meditative adventure. Search for ancient artifacts, avoid traps and light lanterns! Without you, darkness will consume everyone!

name: The Laundry
description: A terrible game in which a mysterious man explores the washroom in which he came to wash his clothes for the night looking.

name: Dangerous Sea Area
description: Sandbox game. Try to survive on islands in extreme environments

name: The Hardest Thing Ever
description: The Hardest Thing Ever is a first-person game where you will solve puzzles with physics

name: The Wave Story
description: A totally mysterious and enigmatic game, can you discover the end of this story?

name: Angry Putin
description: Angry Putin is a third person simulation game. Putin is angry and he will relax by beating other people, dancing with music and drinking VOTKA VOTKA VOTKA!

name: Beauty Contest
description: Clara wants to take first place in a Beauty Contest but meets her long-time rival Sherly and childhood friend Olivia. Will Clara be able to win, or will other feelings awaken in her?

name: Vertical Slice: A Game Dev Story
description: From nobody to famous game producer in 3 years: that’s the journey you will live! Experience the trials and tribulations of game development in this life simulation game: live through the process of founding a small team and learning how to work together to develop a successful game.

name: Shoo, Box!
description: Shoo, Box! is a silly sneaker adventure, where you play as a shoe box who comes to life with a pair of human legs. Use the shoes you collect to solve exciting stealth puzzles, explore the world in search of your owner, and ruin a bunch of peoples' days!

name: Asura's Wrath: Part IV Nirvana
description:
It was not the end. The cries that echo across the planet have yet to cease. But why? Why does the world still suffer?

Asura and Yasha take on the one who has been manipulating even the demigods themselves in "Part IV: Nirvana," the epic four episode conclusion to Asura's Wrath!

name: Imprisoned Hyperion
description: Imprisoned Hyperion is an immersive sim, first-person RPG. Explore the dark and dangerous dungeons of a world that has survived its end. Survive by finding safe resting places and cooking food. Help different creatures and learn the dark history of this world and your own.

name: 23UL
description: A cute 2D adventure game, explore, fight, craft and help a little mushroom on his personal quest <3

name: Pacific Life
description: Start a new life and see where it leads you! Build your house or work hard to buy one. Become a leader or just live by your own, the choice is yours! Gather, build, craft and improve!

name: Dairy Dave
description: You take control of Dave, the involuntary star of a commercial for a big milk corporation. While avoiding obstacles, your main goal in this beautiful mountain panorama is – you have probably guessed it – to collect as much milk as possible. Dave can move around freely on the screen with controls inspired by famous classic Jump and Runs. But beware: You are running against the clock! So make sure to keep milking to refill the timer. While you progress through the game, the obstacles become tougher to avoid, too. The graphics, music, and sound effects are straight-up inspired by the good old days of video game history.

name: Rome 2077: Space Wars
description: Unknown planets, whole new universe, with hundreds of ships to fight and explore, special abilities and ships craft. Rome 2077: Space Wars is a top-down shooter with ship craft, storyline, RPG element, survival endless mode and much more!

name: ATC Infinite
description: In ATC Infinite you can play different airports where you need to manage and control departing and arrival aircraft.

name: Jump Again!
description: The idea for Jump Again! was born when the developer noticed that their friends were afraid of heights in VR games. Can you beat this game? The VR version is fully supported and it also includes the non-VR PC fully supported version as well, plus 7 unique levels.

name: Dimetrosaur 2
description: Sequel to fan favorite dimetrosaur, features returning characters continuing the story. Dimetrosaur 2 is a stealth action dinosaur horror game.

name: Li Tan
description: You wake up in a room full of mysteries, accompanied by a beautiful girl you have met before. In the following time, you will go on a heartbeat journey to the supernatural world with her.

name: Slime Crown
description: Slime Crown is a colorful pixel art game with a unique but challenging gameplay. The colors green, blue, red and yellow are the key to success.

name: Table Top Turrets
description: Table Top Turrets is a cartoon-style tower defence strategy game based on the imagination of a child playing a board game. Build, Upgrade, Protect!

name: Ship of Theseus
description: Ship of Theseus is an intense Sci-Fi shooter with an in-depth story. An atmospheric single-player campaign is accompanied by a fully featured co-op multiplayer, where cooperation is as important as your own skills.

name: Ziggy
description: Sharpen your speed and dexterity playing Ziggy, an arcade-style game with four levels of play. Use your keyboarding skills to clear all of the words from the pyramid pillars and change them to the new target color, while avoiding the bad guys.

name: My Mud Game
description: Do you know Mud? It was a popular multiplayer online game 20 years ago ~ It is only declining with the development of graphical games, and My Mud Game is to let everyone recall the past and even create games developed by their own games.

name: Probability Race
description: Probability Race is a futuristic racing game. You must use logic, math, probability and luck to win the championship. Play a great variety of minigames and compete in turn based races every day. Unlock abilities and race your way to victory in this platform/stragegy/turnbased game.

name: Super Donald World 2020
description: Build The Wall along the southern border of the United States in this 2.5D runner!

name: Heart World
description: Heart World is a first-person hack and slash game. You will play as Silver and use a sharp sword to fight modular enemies in the heart world.

name: 4 Civilizations
description: Four Civilisations is an indie game. It brings you back to early civilization times and lets you control the destiny of your civilization. You will compete with 3 other civilizations in the game. You will need to gather resources to advance in science and upgrade your buildings.

name: Trainslation
description: What happens when you try navigate a foreign subway system with only a piece of paper on you without being able to understand the signs?

name: Virus Blast
description: What if you could use yourself as a bullet? Virus Blast is Fast paced Shooter where YOU are the bullet, try to steal as much data as you can while climbing an endless procedural generated matrix! All of this while the firewall is stepping on your toes trying to stop you!

name: The Triumphant Return of Diabolos
description: A turn-based RPG with an Active Time Battle system. Many years after humanity came together to defeat a powerful demon, a young man trains to become an imperial knight. One day however, he is confronted by a mysterious figure who says, "We have been waiting for you, Demon Lord."

name: Speedbreak Hyperdrive
description: Speedbreak Hyperdrive is a high speed, action platformer. Rush through thrilling, action-packed stages with speed and style.

name: Plushie Dungeon
description: Time is the essence. Every sencond must be spend carefully because the world of Plushie is dangerous place. Manage your time, take care of your boss and find your mate.

name: Knight vs. Giant
description: As the legendary Knight, you must engage in combat against mysterious titanic giants that have roamed and terrorized the Kingdom.

name: Alien Duel Elements
description: Challenge your friends on a one-on-one simple, easy-to-handle 2D platform. Play as Aliens mastering elementary powers such as Fire, Frost and Arcanes. Customize your character as well as the Game modes.

name: Endurium
description: Ready your plasma blades and face off against wave after wave of incoming beams as you struggle to survive at ever increasing speeds.

name: Daldos
description: Daldos - a game about the confrontation of two players, whose warriors came together in battle on board a single drakkar. A game about cold calculation. You will have to fight with other players from all over the world in the classic game of ancient Vikings and show who is the best here!

name: Battle Cat vs. Treacherous Mice
description: Battle Cat is an action platformer with saws, jumps and teleports.

name: Smart Thief
description: Smart Thief is a 3rd person theft simulator where you are in the role of an amateur robber who steals every night from differents houses/markets.

name: Astero
description: This game is about flying in space. You must destroy asteroids from the explosion of an object near the planet Jupiter. You will also encounter other extraterrestrial objects and even UFOs.

name: Physics
description: Physics is a sandbox game. You can create whatever you want, with no limits.

name: Simply Hard Platformer
description: Permadeath platformer featuring 50 levels of frustrating goodness. Easy to play but hard to master.

name: A Rabbit and the Mystic Fog
description: A Rabbit and the Mystic Fog is a virtual reality adventure in which you go on a search for the inhabitants of the valley, who have disappeared since a mysterious fog appeared in their homeland. Help the little rabbit by completing the story around the charismatic characters of the valley.

name: Happy Puzzle
description: Happy Puzzle is a puzzle game that extra an interesting story. The main character is a servant, working in a noble family. After save his young lady. He want to go to the forest to find the magic water.

name: Hepta Beats
description: Hepta Beats is a 2D side-view platformer game in which the levels are controlled by the rhythm, predict adversities by following the rhythm to surpass the challenges.

name: Liu Yan Zhen Tan
description: Sin descripción

name: Slumber Clause
description: From the creator of Speed Dating for Ghosts comes a new weird text adventure about death and sleep paralysis set in the late 1980s.

name: Lasertron
description: Arkanoid with optic styled physics and different bonuses. Lasertrons can be reflected, refracted, decompose into a spectrum of lasertrons, change their colors. Clean the playing field by lasertrons!

name: El Mucho
description: El Mucho is a round based tactical RPG in a fiction world called Liberika. It is inspired by old classics like Langrisser aka Warsong. El Mucho is all about protecting the world from the attacks of the nasty monsters.

name: Before Nightfall: Summertime
description: In this game you will walk through a beautiful summer forest in search for firewood

name: Binger Ninja
description: The phone rings. Ninja’s ‘R’ Us answer the call off of a multi-millionaire whose daughter has been kidnapped. Scanning the books, the ninja for hire company realise there is only one unit available.

name: Scribble Fight
description: Are you a good shooter? It's time to show it! Play a little, or a lot there's no skill ceiling, so you can always get better and better. Just try to survive the enemy waves.

name: Nova Odessa
description: Nova Odessa is an action/adventure game where you play as a novice demon hunter to kill demons and buy stuff for your house.

name: Survivor Jones
description: Jump, Swing, Fight, Survive! Fast paced game-play, arcade style, rogue lite mechanics and procedurally generated levels. Each level is a new challenge every time.

name: The Reason Why Raeliana Ended up at the Duke's Mansion
description: Revived as a minor character in a novel, Raeliana tries to escape her ill-fated ending in this survival romance. And new endings are about to be created with the choices you make.

name: Tusk of Spirit
description: A plot driven 2D RPG about a young girl uncovering a deceptive government plot while attempting to fulfill her master's dying wishes

name: You Will Die Here Tonight
description: Explore in top-down retro aesthetics and face the horrors of Breckenridge Hall in pulse-pounding first person combat. Scavenge for supplies, solve puzzles, and upgrade your gear. Do whatever it takes to survive, but remember: You Will Die Here Tonight.

name: Ghost Mountain Roller Coaster
description: Ghost Mountain is an epic 12 minutes long virtual reality roller coaster ride in a dark underground mine, filled with dreamlike scenery and magical, abstract landscapes, with fast and slow sections, indoor and outdoor areas and many surprises.

name: Kings Town
description: Build up your own civilization in the time of kings and kingdoms. Become the manager of a little town and make it to a great city. Defend it from other kingdoms and destroy them.

name: Toru
description: Toru is a bullet-hell platformer where absolutely everything that falls into your hands becomes a weapon! Boxes, crystals, bombs and even the enemies themselves! Your success depends only on your skill!

name: Before Began
description: A word adventure game with open world elements Time change as time goes by in reality and in the game Different NPCs have their own living habits Players can control the character to explore the city Trigger the mutual influence of various events, affect the final outcome of "Li"

name: Atirin Life
description: Start a new life in Atirin! Will you run the best shop in town? Stall with garden goods? Why don't you check out what does the neighborhood has to offer? Choice is yours! Take your time and enjoy yourself in Atirin

name: Leng Xie Zheng Tou Zi
description: This is a text adventure game, different options have different endings. Be careful, don't be killed by the psychopathic heroines because of the wrong choice!

name: Skyratz
description: Take to the air as one of six unique heroes and soar through Avion City as you perform tricky maneuvers, hunt for weapons and armor, and battle in the skies to claim your spot on the pecking order!

name: Fantasy Dungeon VR
description: Fantasy Dungeon VR is a roguelike dungeon crawler with gesture-based abilities. Use more than just your sword for fighting.

name: Life of Food
description: Play through a campaign with multiple levels, or fight against or with your friends in the arena. Play as four different types of characters, plus a secret character unlocked by finishing the campaign. Each character has a unique set of skills and animations.

name: Move It Up
description: Move It Up V1.1 brings a unique rhythm game experience with random level generator and battle mode.

name: Guns Blazing
description: Descend your way through an abandoned laboratory, swarming with both mechanical and human enemies. Your mission? Wipe them all out. In this fast-paced, casual, sci-fi, FPS, your goal is to employ an arsenal of upgradable weapons to defeat your enemies and reach the bottom of this derelict facility.

name: Dwarves & Dungeons
description: The game is innovated on the traditional game of Match-3 Puzzler, combined with the elements of rougelike game, adding hard core content, bringing a new and unique experience.

name: Denari
description: Denari twists the hack and slasher genre with the power of telekinesis, allowing players to redirect enemy projectiles. The story follows a young warrior gifted with the power of a goddess to fight the invading Denari empire.

name: Eternity Protectors
description: They are coming. Ready your weapons. Get behind that wall. Shoot... and run! Includes 20 minutes session Hero Defense: Shoot, dodge, summon, run, defend, die, respawn, unlock new characters, replay. Have fun.

name: Security Guy vs. AI: The Dawn of AI
description: Security Guy vs. AI: The Dawn of AI is a short top-down shooter game with a mysterious story. Reveal the truth about what happened at your workplace and stop the Evil Artificial Intelligence from spreading out.

name: Liberte
description: Liberté is a deck-builder roguelite inspired by the French Revolution and body horror. Brave the war-torn streets as Rene - a regular Parisian entangled in a civil war caused by a cryptic invader from another dimension, Lady Bliss. Collect cards, nurture alliances, and try to stay alive!

name: Escape from Poalet
description: Escape from Poalet is a point & click 3D graphic adventure game for one player. Help our protagonist to escape from Poalet while discovering all its secrets.

name: Dark Spot
description: Dark Spot is a puzzle game with hand drawn graphics. Use the mouse to move the dark spot and try not to drop it. The goal of the game is to collect all the stars on the screen and go to the exit. At the moment there are 14 levels available with pleasant music and the difficulty increases with each level.

name: Zigglox
description: Team up with friends or get online and find bricks to build the highest and prettiest tower before the other team ! Beware though, some bricks are... specials!

name: Silly Polly Beast
description: This story is about a girl who, by the will of fate, faced the beast, and in order to become free she was forced to study its nature. A story-driven roguelike with aggressive gunfights and terrifying monsters awaits you. How far can you go in the fight for your freedom?

name: VR Fighter Jets War
description: This is a VR immersive flight shooting game with exquisite and gorgeous graphics. The overall environment is mainly based on aerial combat. High-fidelity sound effects provide players with a different shooting experience.

name: Abelana's Atom Maker
description: Visualize atomic orbitals, navigate across energy levels, gain an intuitive understanding of the composition of atoms and their electron configurations by assembling all elements of the periodic table. An educational VR experience designed for use by enthusiasts and academics alike.

name: Fractal Alchemist
description: Fractal Alchemist is a tool for creating and exploring 3D Fractal Worlds. For this you do not need knowledge of mathematics and programming - the Alchemist will do everything for you.

name: Drema
description: Drema is first-person quest that guides you through a series of unique locations, each with a story to tell. A journey through consciousness, with puzzle and horror elements.

name: Sunset Shapes
description: Bring broken pieces together, to reveal shapes of everyday objects. Travel with a Daisy and a Maggot along side several scenarios and discover to where they are headed to.

name: Neon Dimension
description: Welcome to an old-school arcade game with a modern design, in which you will enjoy exciting visual effects and excellent physics. And the relaxing gameplay is so easy to learn that you'll understand the whole idea after a few tries!

name: Void Marauders
description: Lead a band of space pirates and loot and pillage your way across the stars in this turn based tactical game!

name: Slimekeep
description: Slimekeep is a fast-paced rogue-like with unique decision making and intriguing player freedoms, where you kill and capture various slimes to stop the corruption that has infected the land. Venture through procedurally generated levels, and stop the slime king before it's too late.

name: Booobjz
description: You have to solve puzzles and switch gravity.

name: Hundun
description: First-person shooter adventure game 3D shooting, platform jumping, adventure puzzle solving Have a great gun shooting experience

name: Queen's Conquest
description: Experience the fast-paced deep battle system and a high degree of freedom in a fantasy world where Holy Knights and Wizards fight with the power of Mana!

name: Giant Blobs From Mars
description: You are a Giant Blob From Mars who has come to Earth to devour it's rich resources. Consume land to gain energy and leave no land untouched! This casual strategy game allows a single player to escape into mindless game play for hours while listening to a soothing acoustic guitar soundtrack.

name: Apocalypse Island
description: Apocalypse Island is an open-world adventure game. The player take on the role of main character Yolanda as she travels between fantasy dreams and the boring real world.

name: Puerto Viejo
description: Puerto Viejo is a delightful story set during the Spanish Golden Age. You play as Miguel, a young boy on a quest to follow his father’s steps. Explore the city and its surroundings while meeting a colorful cast of characters along the way.

name: Fall of the Mafia
description: Fall Of The Mafia is a 2D action mafia game.

name: Shu's Misfortune
description: Shu's Misfortune is a sample RPG made in RPG Maker MZ. As Shu, end your father's haute couture legacy by unraveling his empire of fashion.

name: Clerk Hot Tale
description: Clerk Hot Tale is a visual novel in which the player goes through all the circles of bureaucratic hell, accompanied by an adorable female official.

name: Drift Racer
description: Drift Racer is 1980s style racing game.

name: Loch Mess
description: A 1 to 2-player co-op puzzle game featuring Scottish cryptids

name: Hybrid Instinct
description: Hybrid Instinct is an action fighting puzzle platformer. Unlock special abilities and collect all Magic Fruits. Defend your territory against challenging enemies. Fly, climb, fight, swim, teleport, ride motorcycles, solve puzzles and explore all hand-painted Levels.

name: Dab on Darkness!
description: Dab On Darkness is a cozy, short, non-linear visual novel where you learn real world, practical tactics to deal with those nasty thoughts you would rather not have. Make the correct decision as your inner negativity manifests into a cute anime girl, lest you despair into the darkness...

name: Tail Trail
description: Follow the story of a Private investigator hired to find a missing person on a mysterious island.

name: Space Ninja Simulator
description: Its a Space Game Simulator but your also an Ninja. Oh, and you'll destroy thousands of asteroids with your ninja powers!

name: Dream Escape VR
description: Dream Escape is a racing and shooting game. You need to avoid the attacks of various monsters in the dreamland, and collect time to escape the entanglement of the nightmare.

name: Digital Janitors
description: Digital Janitors is an action-packed desktop defense game where hackers have taken your employer’s network hostage, which means the player must go to each computer in the company, excise the virus, and beat the hacker threat.

name: Life is sad
description: The game simulates a person in a state of depression and allows you to play while your days go by. The content includes images and sounds that may remind you of sadness, or even the pain of loss. It's a game about life and choices.

name: Skull Head World
description: Defend Skull Head World. Shoot skulls at invading skulls. Collect skulls to protect your skull. Flush skulls to upgrade. Part single-stick bullet-hell shooter, part top-down physics brawler. Super addictive arcade fun.

name: Squirrel Divorce
description: Squirrel Divorce is a top down game where you control a squirrel and dodge the moles that crawl out of their holes, and also run away from annoying ex-wives and collect scattered luggage around the location. Each time one of the wives steals your truck and you have to catch up with a heavy truck.

name: Take Me Home
description: A marvelous third-person adventure game full of wonders and mystery. You will play as a wolf and your goal is to try to get back home overcoming obstacles along your way.

name: Sport Shooter
description: Sport Shooter puts the player in a sprawling open-world shooting ground, set amongst the rolling hills, forests, lakes and rivers of the Northern English countryside, featuring a multitude of shooting sports, from clay pigeons, to timed 3-gun competitions.

name: Demian: The Ritual
description: There was a forest front of a girl who awake from a dream. The girl couldn’t remember anything and she didn’t know where to go. She wandered in forest to get out of there, and she met strange family. The family's destination was a house that spirits who had a grudge lived.

name: Mariachi Undead
description: Mariachi Undead is a hand drawn, rhythm, cover based shoot-em-up, action side scrolling platformer where you can even play with a guitar and controller at the same time.

name: Versus: The Deathscapes
description: When a new threat emerges on planet Versus, you and your allies are forced to explore the dreaded Deathscapes to survive.

name: SMIB: Mission Cure
description: SMIB is a small robot with a big problem. Humankind can’t smile anymore and sent SMIB to space to find the cure. It needs YOU to remotely program its routes in its biggest mission: an adventure through the most exotic planets in the Universe. Solve puzzles, find the cure, and get SMIB back to Earth!

name: Revolution: Path of a Weaponsmith
description: Fight for your loved ones and your country in this third person stealth shooter. Scavenge for weapon parts and supplies to survive and maybe even make some profit through trade. Make difficult choices in a branching story taking place in an alternative history in which US has invaded USSR in 1989.

name: Alchemania
description: Alchemania is a pixel arcade platformer with a side view. This is a reaction game - you need to press button at the correct time.

name: Herr Palmister
description: After the overthrow of British government in India and arrival of allied German troops in year 1938, begins the process of Caste Reformation, based on teachings of palmistry. Now the fate of an ordinary person depends only on their hands' lines - and, of course, on your decisions, Herr Palmister.

name: Brash Monster Simulator
description: This is an open world role-playing game with cartoon color. Operating stores, obtaining materials, building equipment, defeating monsters, training characteristic staff, open skill combination system, characteristic team building and strange painting system, can hardly stop!

name: Silence in the Dark
description: This is 2D Horror, survival, puzzle solving, action noir inspired by classic Japanese horror games.

name: Two Brain Sides
description: Two Brain Sides is hard action platformer game where you need to control two geometric shapes at the same time, moving through the danger using the brain to pay attention in different obstacles. Everything happens at the same time.

name: Stone it!
description: Stone it! is a logic puzzle game where you roll the block to the target through winding paths, elevators, bridges. Think over your steps and use lasers to clear your way.

name: Egg Rabbit
description: This is a different platform jumping game.You can control the distance and height of jumping by yourself.

name: Into the Light
description: Damien will have to survive by managing his resources to stay in the light and avoid the appearance of another world with new rules and dangerous residents. Will you be up to the task?

name: Captains & Dungeons
description: Captains & Dungeons is an Action Role Playing Game (aRPG), in which you must survive the daemons of the dungeons. To escape and to return to your pirate ship you must pass every level which is full of daemons. But be careful there are level-end bosses at the end of each level.

name: Arc Wizards 3
description: The war of the wizards begins! This is an exciting action game with a 16-bit taste!

name: Cardiac Unrest
description: You're a Combat Exorcist tasked with ridding a school of its evil. Armed with your Holy Gun and a Ghostometer, you must locate and exorcise the shadowy spirit terrorizing this school before you get overtaken by its dark evil.

name: Fragments of a Mind
description: Help Cassandra uncover the truth behind her family's betrayal in this action packed adventure game full of intricate puzzles, vicous enemies and deadly traps.

name: Girl Agent
description: Girl Agent is a 3D cartoon shooting game . Set agent training and real-time combat in parallel. The secret plot is quietly brewing in the fog. A number of girl agents have gathered and are waiting for the players. Now join the wishlist and let's go!

name: Riding Shotgun
description: A micro party game where one person controls the movement and another person controls the shooting.

name: Siren Head: The Siren's Forest
description: In this indie horror game, you must escape the Siren’s Forest! Use multiple means of transportation to aid your escape. Unearth what truly happened in the forest by interacting with certain objects that could provide you with the answers you need. But be careful… There’s something out there!

name: Mysterious Blocks
description: Mysterious Blocks is a puzzle game in which you will find many interesting and difficult levels.

name: BattleJuice Alchemist
description: BattleJuice Alchemist is a singleplayer RPG combining classic top-down combat with third person bullet time. Explore a dark procedural world, learn ritual magic, solve riddles, craft alchemical potions and combine them in deck-building-like fashion to fight the demons overrunning the lands.

name: Gerrymander Madness
description: Gerrymander Madness places gamers into a fictional North Carolina legislator's office and allows them to manipulate the districts of a state map to gain political advantage for a chosen party.

name: Dstnce.
description: Dstnce. is a platforming adventure game where you work your day job, clean up your room, look after your plant, and so much more as you try to get by one step at a time. This is your game, it is what you make of it.

name: Ninja Lexx
description: This is a game about an ordinary guy with a guitar, whose life changed after meeting with bandits.The game has a simple but interesting storyline and cinematics/graphics.

name: Ponk's Jam
description: How fast can you beat Ponk's Jam? Join Ponk on an adventure across the entire Ponk World, fighting small enemies and big bosses! Race to get the best time, the quicker the time means the bigger the winner. Beating the game under a certain time could crown you the best Ponker ever!

name: A Letter to You!
description: A psychological horror game where fear and paranoia merge into a terrifying story!

name: HighFleet
description: Battle for survival in the skies of a mysterious future Earth in this unique action-strategy game mixing arcade combat, exploration, management and diplomacy. As giant flying ships wage spectacular aerial warfare, a prophecy tells of one who will save the world – could it be you?

name: Mini Island: Summer
description: Mini Island: Summer is one small hold & gun, boss rush mini-game of casual difficulty! This beautiful place was built only for simple fun! Choose the character and difficulty level that best suits you and enjoy a short, simple but colorful boss rush mini-game!

name: Treasure Tile
description: Treasure Tile is a hack'n'slash action RPG that takes place in a world completely made up of tiles. You are a tile, you fight other tiles and you earn tile treasure!

name: Parabolus Two
description: Shoot your way across the galaxy in this thrilling adventure! It’s the sci-fi shooter which blends old school game mechanics with modern story driven cinematic experiences. Unlock the mystery of strange events all over the Milky Way and find out who (or what) is behind them.

name: Cannon Lab 13
description: Cannon lab 13 is a laboratory where experiments are carried out to study the behavior of an ultra-bouncing ball after a shot from a special cannon. The game is a puzzle of different levels, where the player has to use logical thinking to get into the hole without spending all attempts to shoot.

name: Minicraft Shooter
description: Minicraft Shooter is an epic time killer shooter with a top view in which you face an endless crowd of zombies, in the scenery of a cyberpunk metropolis, a modern city and a green forest. and all this in a cubic style!

name: Thief Simulator 2
description:
Thief Simulator 2 will transport you to a world full of valuables, expensive cars, and rustling banknotes. As long as you find a way to steal them.
Know that a thief's trade is not a piece of cake. In order to get some practice, you'll start with petty theft. This is how you'll gain the experience required to access more and more risky - and most importantly, more profitable - jobs.

name: NBA 2K22
description: NBA 2K22 puts the entire basketball universe in your hands. Play now in real NBA and WNBA environments against authentic teams and players. Build your own dream team in MyTeam with today’s stars and yesterday’s legends. Live out your own pro journey in MyCareer and experience your personal rise to the NBA. Flex your management skills as a powerful Executive in MyGM and MyLeague. Anyone, anywhere can hoop in NBA 2K22.

name: Beyond Tokyo
description: Beyond Tokyo is a VR adventure around Shibuya in Tokyo, Japan. Get a taste of the unique culture of Japan by freely exploring a stylized Shibuya and experience different places - both popular and off the beaten path - via 360 videos, photos, narration, and storytelling.

name: Choco Pixel 4
description: Choco Pixel 4 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Sweet Tooth 2
description: Sweet Tooth 2 is a physical puzzle game with a side view. In the second part, there are more new items to pass, the game has become more difficult!

name: Tales from Zilmurik
description: High fantasy turn-based roleplaying game. Immersive story developed over 15 years. A beautifully crafted world rooted in refinement and discipline. Challenging and diverse combat potential.

name: Hexio
description: Connect all the nodes into beautiful and abstract shapes in this exciting puzzle game. Enjoy a relaxing piano soundtrack in your delightful experience.

name: Theater of Carnage
description: Battle for glory in the arena, fighting challengers and climbing the ranks. Show your tactical prowess in this turn-based strategy game. Choose one of distinct factions and put together a team of champions with a set of unique skills. Outsmart and destroy your opponents.

name: The Damathos Clan
description: Travel across different islands, continents and worlds while in the journey to stop a deadly threat and fulfill your duty as a Damathos!

name: Adam the Storyteller
description: Help Adam to solve puzzles around him after being kidnapped by a mysterious land-grabbing floating island. A hand-drawn puzzle-adventure with funny characters, hundred levels and power-up puzzles with unique abilities that will help You to get through a puzzle maze.

name: Jungle House
description: Can you build house in jungle wilderness almost with your hands? Yes, you can! Become an architect in the primitive times for building amazing houses in jungle wilderness with primitive tools. Explore and make houses from secret underground house with pools to houses on high trees.

name: Tale of Ninja: Fall of the Miyoshi
description: Play as a ninja through the Sengoku period of Japan. There are many possible ways to assassinate the target and find your own nindou.

name: Where Is My Mom
description: Where Is My Mom is a side-scrolling game tells a story about the fate of a girl who was stolen.The chapters are divided into stories that differ in gameplay and mechanics: the main mechanics of the game are puzzles but there are also stealth mechanics and horror elements at play as well.

name: WeeRPG
description: Hack and slash your way through this loot-rich ARPG with up to four local friends. Outfit your classless character to look and play the way you want. Tactical gear combinations and combat skill will determine how deep you can go.

name: The Vagabond Emperor
description: The Vagabond Emperor is a 2D RPG where you begin as a simple vagabond who decides to become an emperor in the fictional Middle Ages during a spreading curse. It's up to you to decide what to do and where to go to achieve your goals.

name: Brothers Apart
description: Brothers Apart is a story driven action-adventure RPG. Take control of Leiyn and his wolf companion Monster and unearth the stories they weren't meant to learn.

name: Deadzoned: A Credits Bounty
description: Deadzoned is a low-tech sci-fi traditional Roguelike. Blast your way through the lawless sectors battling dangerous creatures, outlaws, and the environment itself. But you'll need your wits to make best use of the variety of resources you stumble upon to survive and claim the head of your bounty!

name: Navin: In Search of the Light
description: Something happened to Navin. What is this strange place? What is going on? Why did I come here? Explore this magical world to help Navin to come back home, to his family and friends!

name: Askold: Path of the Shadow
description: Askold: Path of the Shadow is a stealth game with exciting story. Investigate extensive levels from a cosy small village to the shadowy hostile swamp. Beat your enemies and complete the mission in the most unexpected ways. Inquire the complicated storyline and determine the fate of the Kingdom.

name: The King of the Oceans
description: Life is not that easy in any case in the bittersweet place called "Ocean". Solomon must eat and grow bigger in order to survive. Could you help Solomon fill his belly to grow big and strong?

name: Lost Bazaar
description: Merchant-princes gather from all corners of the world to sell their bric-a-brac for a tidy profit. An easy to learn, hard to master multiplayer card game where 2 to 4 players compete for the customers in the mythical Bazaar.

name: A Marble's Muse
description: Will you be able to find love and create art in Liliana, a colorful land full of marbles?

name: Legends of Gondwana
description: Legends of Gondwana is a multiplayer RPG with a mythical, ancient story with Science Fiction elements to offer players new experiences and visions for a new world and new legends based on long-forgotten lore.

name: Video Editor Tycoon
description: Based on tycoon games, Video Editor Tycoon provides a way for you to manage a video publishing company, where your mission is to maintain a financial balance in the face of monthly payments and also a professional balance for employees who are not fired.

name: Ministry of Pandemic
description: Ministry of Pandemic is a strategy and simulation game that forces social and economic balance during the pandemic. Formulate your strategy for survival while keeping all aspects of society steady.

name: Gachi Dungeon Master
description: Take on the role of one of the five legendary gachimuchi icons and enter the arena. Each character is distinguished by their own grips and strikes. Someone falls with his ass right on the face of the opponent, and someone gracefully wringes the opponent's hands.

name: The Legend of The Black Wizard
description: The 'Wizard' (Player) is in an open world 2D Top-Down map. The thing is, not everyone likes him. There's bounties on him, and he needs to survive. He can find allies that can help him, or he can be unlucky and find people that will kill him.

name: Sports Paradise VR
description: On an island like no other, you will find many sports you know and love. Experience archery, boxing, and running, in an environment built for VR. Your sports paradise awaits.

name: Traverse the Void
description: Traverse The Void is an action/adventure VR game where players build and share levels for others to explore. Climb above bottomless pits, jump perilously from platform to platform, hide from enemies, spelunker deep into caves, and use your terrain deformation tool to creatively solve challenges.

name: Captain Coffer 2D
description: Captain Coffer 2D is an arcade platformer starring a real, immortal treasure of a hero. Hop away on your peglegs and blast doubloons across 16 handcrafted, puzzle-oriented stages. Make your escape before time runs out and save the universe whilst discovering distinct, fantasy-themed worlds!

name: Alien Cat 6
description: If you want to feel like an attentive owner of a restless cat, then this game will be to your taste!

name: Triple Dungeon
description: Control three adventurers simultaneously in this experimental split-screen dungeon crawling adventure!

name: Mars Accident
description: Mars Accident is a 2d shooter where the player dodges a falling and flying saucer. The only thing that raises it is the laser energy bunches that the hero releases and which destroy the aliens. The goal of the game is to fight off the alien attack and protect your spaceship from the attack.

name: Don Flatus: Poop Hunter
description: After years of sending probes to Uranus, all the debris is now orbiting the planet as a ring of junk. The interplanetary commission has now sent a crack cleanup crew to clean the ring around Uranus. The team arrive at the planet and find that Uranus has been invaded by an alien presence!

name: Cyber Hunter: Awakening
description: Cyber ​​Hunter: Awakening is a game about a reckless bounty hunter who went out to hunt criminals in his city.

name: Battle Sad Boy
description: Battle Sad Boy is a third-person character sword fighting game that talks about different topics in each chapter. Visually cartoonish in nature, the game features multiple ideas and is not limited to one style of play.

name: Directive Nine
description: Directive Nine is a VR FPS Roguelite in a sci fi setting. "How is the Galactic Federation ever going to expand with these pesky settlers in the Outer Reaches? Get out there and deal with it for us. You know what I mean. You know. It's... I'm talking about destroying them. Like, dead dead."

name: Blewie
description: Blewie was created and programmed by a 1 man team out of a sheer love of puzzle and platform games. Help Blewie escape the fun-house - with such an epic puzzle-solving adventure as the little ghost, will he catch a break?

name: Clash of Irons: Blitzkrieg
description: Clash of Irons: Blitzkrieg is a real-time tank RPG+SLG game. It recreates the classic tanks of World War II and restores the shocking war scenes with fantasy World War II plots. Command your futuristic tanks across history and rekindle your war spirit with the will of iron and blood.

name: Cave Quest 2
description: Fight back against the underworld by acquiring powerful talents and spells on your journey to save your friends in this exciting and clever Match 3 game!

name: Jack Sprout
description: Jack Sprout is an educational RPG based in the fantasy setting of Beaver Creek Meadow. Players will explore the region to collect resources and complete various tasks for the neighbors. These tasks will help teach Jack about his importance to the community.

name: Slow and Steady
description: Slow and Steady is a game where you make the slowest tortoise ever reach the finish line.

name: Bleach Party
description: Just Add Noise is an audio reactive sandbox world builder. Create a world, play it music and watch it react and evolve.

name: Quiet Thoughts
description: Quiet Thoughts is a challenging narrative-driven platformer, centered on Asha's journey as she discovers what lies beyond her forest home, and searches for an escape from her own feelings.

name: Bigfoot Forest
description: Bigfoot Forest is a first-person indie horror game. While traveling in your car, you run out of gas and find yourself far away from any civilized locations at night, with only woods and a small town nearby.

name: Wild Workshop
description: Wild Workshop is a country-life RPG. From now on, you will get yourself an uninhabited island! You can transform the island into your lovely space. Start a farm, keep animals, make DIYs, and even build a house. Gradually accomplish your dreamland and make money at the same time!

name: Zombie Survival Online
description: Zombie Survival Online is a top-down 2D shooting multiplayer game that you can enjoy in 10 to 16 minutes. Pick up items, combine them, and survive the longest among other players in a large city where zombies appear at night! As the days go by, the sort of zombies increases, and poisonous gas hits the city...

name: Rokka
description: Rokka is an atmospheric Winter War simulator where you achieve a "defensive victory" by shooting incoming enemy soldiers and tanks. The game features adult humor.

name: To Ash & Ember
description: To Ash & Ember is a challenging gothic roguelite horror RPG about imperfectly saving the world. Select your pawn, lead them through terrors and tomes, and build them into heroes to face off against the Gods man failed to slay. Can you save this world or only its embers?

name: Spawn Kings
description: Spawn Kings is a turn-based monster collecting fantasy RPG in which you are given the freedom on how you wish to level and progress through the game whether it be through completing quest or battling wild monsters.

name: BouncyBoi in Puzzle Land
description: A colourful tile based puzzler, now with added bounce!

name: Russian Mailman Simulator
description: This is an epic first person simulation game where the player defends his mail truck, while delivering letters to the local Russian population. The player must upgrade his gear, survive radiation sickness, and fight wave after wave to fulfill his duty!

name: God Sword
description: God Sword is an online world designed to present the real world，There is life and death, love and hate...

name: Two Bit Hero
description: A classic retro metroidvania - retroidvania if you will - with (mostly) black and white graphics. Handcrafted, fast-paced action with multiple endings.

name: Perfect Heist 2
description: Perfect Heist 2 is a round-based online game, where robbers try to hide in plain sight while robbing a bank without being noticed by the cop team!

name: Escape to Sidious
description: After Earth's downfall, a new planet must now be colonized and defended against attackers. Explore new technologies and revive trade. Settlers, the future lies ahead. Follow me to a better world. May Iridium be with us!

name: Drive 21
description: Drive 21 is a simulation game. By earning money with job opportunities, by making logistics and bus driver, by buying and modifying your own vehicle with the money you earn, you can make your own vehicle and you can travel with your own vehicle with open world driving experience.

name: Pro Deer Hunting 2
description: Pro Deer Hunting 2 continues the great tradition of realistic deer hunting simulations! Major graphics enhancements, inclusion of the muzzle loading rifle and climbing tree stand are just a few of the new features. Keep the tradition alive and become the next Pro Deer Hunter 2!

name: Pog 2
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: SubterAlien Rescue
description: Subteralien Rescue is a physics based sidescroller where you pilot a lander module assigned to explore underground caverns and bases. Travel from planet to planet to encounter new levels with different puzzles and environments, rescue your fellow pilots and fight enemies.

name: Brave Deeds of Rescue Team
description: Lead the emergency services, manage vehicles, coordinate various rescue workers and keep regular citizens safe.

name: Combat Mech VR
description: Combat Mech VR is a casual VR shooter inspired by Mecha Animes. Made for fans who love playing with action figures.

name: Gravitators
description:
Gravitators is a Gravity Twin Stick Shooter game where you pilot ships and complete mission objectives to secure the future of humankind. Defend the Earth and travel through the galaxy to repel an alien invasion.

Inspired by classic games like Thrust, Gravitar, Asteroids, Solar Jetman and others, Gravitators unshelves this old genre and overhauls it into modern times, while keeping the genre's trademark features: maneuvering through tight spots while carrying heavy objects, fighting enemies and preserving fuel.

name: Robot Female Hero 3
description: Several years after the events of Robot Female Hero 2, a group of tyranical invaders had arrived to try and take of the Milky way. Standing in their way is the cast from the first game. Once again this is a classic top-down RPG that seeks to recreate the games that dominated the 90's!

name: Era of Defense
description: Era of Defense is a first person open world game, in which your character is stuck back in time with a powerless time machine, surrounded by prehistoric people and prehistoric dangers. You must collect crystals from various sources to power up your time machine and travel back to the present. Crystals are given as rewards for quests given to you by locals, in which you defend sacred temples from onslaughts of enemies. Gain experience points through battle, which you can exchange for ever better weaponry, such as more advanced axes, hammers and bows, which in turn allow you to fight more difficult enemies.

name: Ekstase
description: Amazing techno beats and beautiful visuals set the stage for a game that honors the long forgotten falling block puzzle genre. Ekstase is easy to pick up and sink many hours into. With both classic and new game modes, there is something here for both the casual and the hardcore puzzle game player.

name: Raging Ball
description: First finish the game, then improve your speed.

name: Moving Letters
description: Enjoy word find games? Try it and You’ll never experience a dull moment after you try this addicting word puzzle game. Play this game once and just you won’t be able to put it down.

name: Impulse, From Here!
description: Impulse, From Here! is a 2D action game featuring unique aerial controls that allow you to blow yourself up in explosions as you progress! The stages are highly challenging and offer multiple routes, so there's replay-ability! Look at the way the cute girl gets beaten up badly!

name: BunnyShot
description: Play as an Easter bunny, score points and save chickens using Easter eggs in BunnyShot!

name: Military Service
description: Military Service is a side-scrolling shooting game. The protagonist will be transformed into a rifle soldier in voluntary service, learning about firearms, grenades, and marching. Use guns and grenades to knock down enemies encountered in the mission! Based on defense education, strengthen the awareness of defense against the enemy, and maintain national security!

name: Cheap Game
description: Cheap Game is simply an endless runner with pixel graphics and lots of interesting mechanics that can be combined to obtain surprising effects. In this game you run and kill monsters.

name: Wiz
description: Wiz is a 2D pixel-art Metroidvania focused on exploration and skilled combat with great rewards. Enter the world of Wiz and try saving the land to restore light and balance for all living creatures.

name: God Cop Bad Cop
description:
In God Cop Bad Cop, you play as a god who watches over a city to find a killer.
Analyze the movements of the villagers, use your legendary sense of deduction, find the killer and strike him down!

name: Lion Quest Infinity
description: Jethro the Lion and friends steal a magic grandfather clock and embark on an unforgettable adventure. Are they here to save the universe, or is it simply a marketing ploy constructed as part of an elaborate book tour?

name: Use Your Outside Voice, Richie Tozier!
description: An interactive alternate ending for the 2019 movie It Chapter Two. Playing as Richie Tozier, you return to the house on Neibolt Street to relive the events of the movie and try to get everyone out alive.

name: Renovation Products Collection 1
description:
Renovation Collection 1 is bringing twelve incredible 16-bit games from Japanese publisher Telenet and its US subsidiary Renovation. These twelve titles were never released in Europe during their original run and so this is a first for the UK and EU to have non-imported physical versions of these 16-bit titles.

The games list is:
• Arcus Odyssey
• Beast Wrestler
• Dino Land
• El Viento
• Exile
• Final Zone
• Gaiares
• Granada
• Sol-Deace
• Traysia
• Valis: The Fantasm Soldier
• Valis 3

name: Were.Wolf
description: Were.Wolf is a stealthy puzzle platformer where you play as a young man who is turned into a werewolf. Follow him through a dark and mysterious castle as he tries to reach the potion to lift the curse and escape.

name: The Signal State
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic future, The Signal State puts your logic skills to the test with complex puzzles inspired by modular synthesizers. Repair machines, rebuild an abandoned farm, and be part of a revolution that will change the fate of agriculture once and for all.

name: Tomes and Quests: A Word RPG
description: An upcoming fantasy role-playing game with a word game twist, Tomes and Quests is a whole new take on puzzlers. Three friends have become trapped in a book. The upside is they now have amazing new abilities that are powered by words! Solve word puzzles, battle evil, level up, and save the worlds.

name: Weatherworn: The Adventure of Pap & Pup
description: Weatherworn: The Adventure of Pap & Pup is an all-ages adventure following the young Pup and their astronaut grandfather Pap. The stranded pair investigate a dangerous world. A retro RPG with a modern pace about the seasons of life and loss.

name: Pokémon Psychic Seeds
description: Pokémon Psychic Seeds is a homebrew puzzle-platform game for the Pokémon mini. The player controls Exeggcute eggs, and has to cycle through all of them to solve puzzles and take them to the exit.

name: Scrabble
description: The second most popular crossword puzzle.

name: SpaceEx Commander
description: After hundreds of years of waging wars with space invaders, the human fleet grew weaker. The devastating conflict took many lives. But your will to live is strong and your crew is loyal. Startup your engines, repel conquerors and as you do, collect powerful crystals. Use them to enhance your ship and give it your best shot to level an uneven playing field. The enemy showed some of his forces, but true evil still lies behind front lines...

name: Steam: Rails to Riches Complete Edition
description:
Take control of a railway company, issue shares, build railroads, deliver goods along an ever changing network of tracks and stations and make profit to expand.

You build the tracks, upgrade towns, improve your train, and grab the right goods to make the longest, most profitable deliveries. Score your deliveries and add to your income or victory points, balancing your need to invest against your quest to win the game. The goal of the game is to score the most victory points and become the best railway company.

Features:
- official Steam: Rails to Riches game
- original artwork
- ingame interactive tutorial
- languages: English, German, Dutch, Portuguese, Polish, French, Spanish, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese Traditional
- play with AI, with friends or both
- 3 levels of difficulty AIs with individual strategies - 3-5 player maps
- climate sounds and music matched to maps
- adaptable animation speed
- official rules
- unique, original board game feel on your console
- colorblind mode
- online multiplayer

name: MouseBot: Escape from CatLab
description: Guide MouseBot through mazes of fantastical mechanical mouse traps created by the cat scientists of CatLab. Dodge giant metal Kitty Krushers, leap over mouse-grinding Roller Graters, evade scary Mines and Lasers, and platform your way across pools of bot-melting Acid on an epic quest for cheese and freedom. Conquer 88 challenging platform-style levels as you delve deeper into the mysterious laboratories of CatLab and uncover the cats' nefarious plans. Collect epic piles of cheese, and transmogrify that cheese into new skins and accessories for your robotic mouse. MouseBot: Escape from CatLab is a zany and exciting platforming game that will test your reflexes, skills, timing, and love of cheese!

name: VR AstroSmash
description: VRAstroSmash is a seated, casual scifi arcade style shooting VR only game. Destroy asteroids, space junk, and UFO'S. Up to 4k textures and 150000 polys. Ship auto upgrades through the game progression, such as auto fire, ship repair, increased weapon cooling, and flight controls.

name: 诛天记
description: Sin descripción

name: Steel Division 2: Nemesis #4 - Storming Toulon
description: Lead two new battlegroups to victory in Nemesis: Storming Toulon with Verteidigungsbereich Toulon and 1e Division Française Libre. This Steel Division 2 expansion features many new units, from Free French Légionnaires to Kriegsmarine Marineinfanterie, Flak 38 105mm guns and British carrier planes.

name: Childhood Gone: Shadowed Wand
description: (Ever heard of this haunted game ...?) This is a top-down pixel adventure-rpg(horror) game! Explore freely! Get around by using magic such as: floating, water walking, and quakes! Combat the MONSTER LORDS and save the Kingdom! (That is... if the 'ghosts' want you to.)

name: Isekai Eternal
description: A Fantasy MOBA game that focuses on champions summoned from other worlds to fight in the Isekai Wars. Take control of powerful champions, and fight for freedom or domination!

name: Three Kingdoms Written Words
description: 《文字三国》是一款三国修仙游戏，在这里你将穿越到三国修真世界，招募群雄豪杰，一起踏上仙途，修仙问道，称霸九州。 放置玩法，简单轻松，一键即可领取丰厚收益！ 每个伙伴都有自己的专属定位，变换阵容及站位，跨战力通关不是梦！ 更有形式各异玩法，军团远征，多人BOSS，矿脉争夺，攻城战、以及不重复的迷宫探险，各种玩法嗨翻天！

name: Horror Villa
description: The orthodox horror puzzle game, at the same time, you can also experience the passionate race with the female ghost and the cool bursting magic in this game!

name: The New Earth
description: 本游戏为太空模拟经营游戏,您需要通过调节各资源产量的平衡以建设您在行星上的基地,用富余的物资组织对遗迹的探险,调查这里发生了什么,并一步一步发现地球的真相

name: Flirtatious: Fallen Angels
description: We're back with the new series of Flirtatious, and your favorite theme of dark fantasy! Connect all the neon pipes together to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #11
description: Go to battle with your friends in the much-requested Army General Coop mode, letting you fight together in one of Steel Division 2’s expansive turn-based strategic campaigns.

name: Total War: Warhammer II - Thorek Ironbrow
description: As a legendary Lord, Thorek Ironbrow leads Ironbrow's Expedition in his quest to recover the relics and help restore the Dwarf Empire. Thorek can also combine resources at the Anvil of Doom to craft powerful artifacts for his forces.

name: Scrapyard Simulator
description: The Prologue of Junkyard Simulator gives you a teste of experience of Junkman's life. You'll be sniffing around, collecting items, visiting the scrap market, and carring out a full renovation of car parts and home appliances. Driving a truck and beating a Junkyard Challenge is the icing on the cake.

name: Sweet Dreams Alex
description: Sweet Dreams Alex is a cute, relaxing puzzle game in which you build labyrinths to keep Nightmares away. Every level presents a new challenge that you can solve in a variety of creative ways while experiencing a cute slice-of-life story about the wonders of childhood. Sweet Dreams Alex draws inspiration from the maze-building of classic tower defense games and the construction-based puzzle-solving of modern games like Poly Bridge and World of Goo.

name: Idle Wasteland: Pet Slot Bundle
description: Contains: 2nd Pet slot so you can equip 2 Pets at once, Blood Rabbit Pet, 15 Pet Tokens, 475 Nuclear Material, 6 Super Skill Points

name: Yoga tte! Oku-sama
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasynth One
description: Fantasynth One is an audio-reactive experience designed for Virtual Reality. Glide through a procedurally populated environment that comes alight with electronic music by French producer N'to.

name: Colonize
description: Colonize is a combination of survival game and building strategy that takes place during the colonization period - the 17th century. It tells the story of a settlement in the new world and all the difficulties encountered by the early settlers.

name: Police Chase

name: Mega Marble World 2
description:
This is a puzzle. You control the ball. You can roll it in 4 directions. The ball is uncontrollable until it stops. You are only able to make a direction change when you hit a surface - it is straight line movements all the way.

Player might have to revisit locations or choose from multiple paths to finish the level. There can be a sequence of challenges that a player must solve to complete the level. Each level has a set of challenges to get around such as pits and other problems.

Some passages are closed by a magical barrier. Use a magic stone to destroy the magic barrier. There are four types of barriers that differ in color. It is necessary to use a magic stone of the corresponding color. There is a universal magic stone - multi-colored.

description: This is a Chinese martial arts-style simulated business game. In the game, players can learn about the story of Tong Lin Chuan by completing tasks, and can develop and build their own sects.

name: Mercury Prime
description: Mercury Prime is a winner generated roguelike. Each day, players compete to earn the right to expand the game - inventing new creatures, items, and powers to add to their worlds. Each week, worlds compete to become Mercury Prime -- the morphing, twisting, liquid metal center at the heart of Mercury.

name: Disquiet Fields
description: Disquiet Fields is a horror game where your objective is to survive. The only thing you have to do is to traverse a sandy path in the middle of mysterious fields being stalked by enigmatic creature. Can you survive all the way to the end of that path?

description: About： With the new J-20 fighter jet's 1942 air-to-air battle game, the last heavy bomber to be destroyed can pass missions Feature： The DLC include full game

description: About： Balloon shooting game, there are balloons in the air flying, before they fly away with your star aimed at each other, fire! Feature： The DLC include full game

description: About: A Three Eliminate Game, use color Cat Style. Move the two adjacent sliders and connect the three identical patterns together to eliminate them Feature： The DLC include full game.

description: About: A Three Eliminate Game, use Duck Style. Move the two adjacent sliders and connect the three identical patterns together to eliminate them Feature： The DLC include full game.
