name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu 2: Ball Break
description: About： A stained glass ball style brick playing game, control marble table to break all the glass ball can pass missions Feature： The DLC include full game.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu 2: Duck Shooter
description: About： Duck mobile target game, there are three kinds of targets, moving duck target, fixed duck target, fixed paper target. Aim at the target and fire. Feature： The DLC include full game。

name: Bananarun
description: Bananarun is a 2D precision platformer rage game. In order to save your kidnapped parents you must go through many harsh challenges that may have some surprises in your way, as it takes you deeper into the unknown.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu 2: Gem Three Elimin
description: About: A Three Eliminate Game, use Gem Style. Move the two adjacent sliders and connect the three identical patterns together to eliminate them Feature： The DLC include full game.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu 2: Tiger Tank 70 IX
description: About： The classic tank battle game re-opens, guarding your base and defeating all indringing enemy tanks Feature： This DLC contains the full Chapter 5.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu 2: Tiger Tank 70 X
description: The classic tank battle game re-opens, guarding your base and defeating all indringing enemy tanks Feature： This DLC contains the full Chapter 5 hard mode

name: Freya's Potion Shop
description: Freya finally opened the potion shop of her dream! But Freya’s mother used Freya’s debt as an excuse to offer her body to Freya’s creditor, Mr. Manji. To save Mr. Manji from Freya’s mother’s grasp, Freya was determined to pay Mr. Manji back as soon as possible.

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu 2: Tiger Tank 70 VIII
description: The classic tank battle game re-opens, guarding your base and defeating all indringing enemy tanks Feature： This DLC contains the full Chapter 4 hard mode

name: The Tower of TigerQiuQiu 2: Under Water Bubble
description: About: As a newly born blister, your dream is to rise to the surface safely, pay attention to avoid those obstacles, embrace the sky Feature： The DLC include full game

name: Luise and Secret Basement Rooms
description: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Sasuke KANNAZUKI. Follow daydreamer Luise in her adventures in this traditional fantasy RPG.

name: Hero's Everyday Life
description: Who is a hero? Is this the one who gets up in the morning for an adventure? Or the one who fights for the good and prosperity? In general, you will need to decide which of you will be the hero and for what you will fight!

name: Recruit One
description: Mission Briefing: Ready to take to the stars, Recruit One? Tackle over 20 trials to prove you're worthy of joining us aboard Lightway Lines, a pioneering space tourism airline. Don't wait around – you're against the clock and a whole lot more in this sci-fi puzzler. Have you got what it takes?

name: Office Love Affair
description: Office Love affair - This is a casual game with a wide variety of puzzles.

name: A Winding Path
description: A Winding Path is a hand-drawn adventure game about finding the beauty of the world and enjoying the little things.

name: Enter the Backrooms
description: An indie psychological horror experience about surviving infinity. Navigate an endless expanse of rooms, ascend through various levels, gather items and artifacts, avoid going insane, evade glitched entities, and see just how deep the realm known as The Backrooms goes.

name: Froggy Destroyer
description: Play as a green froggy that destroys all enemies in its path. Avoid dangerous traps, use useful upgrades, collect all the fruits on your way and reach the finish line!

name: Captain ToonHead vs. The Punks from Outer Space
description: Ever wanted to beat a T-Rex up with a chancla, while building powerful towers that shoot piñatas, hot sauce and heat-seeking fireworks? Captain ToonHead vs. The Punks from Outer Space is the VR tower defense game of your cartooniest dreams. This is not your diorama-style VR tower defense. This time you’re going to have to move all over the map, hammer away to upgrade your towers, throw over-powered chanclas recklessly and shoot electric beams from weaponized pizza at your enemies. Fight from the front lines!

name: Underland: The Climb
description: Use the elements of the scenery, such as picks and many others to drill the soil to the indicated location. Destructive terrain, fluid mechanics and the laws of physics must be handled correctly to solve the puzzles. Escape the city of Underland!

name: Casual Commando
description: It's an action game where you guide a Squad to achieve missions.With one touch controls,Smooth Game play,Beautiful graphics,AI enabled drone to cover for the Squad.

name: Food Comes From Above
description: Use the arrow keys on your keyboard or mouse to move the player sideways to collect food.

name: Mouse Hero
description: Simple and meditative game, use only mouse! The target of the game is simple, without touching obstacles to get to the exit. As hundred levels with increasing difficulty.

name: Aquatics Hentai Babes
description: Clothed to Nude adult puzzle game, one hand playable!

name: Barbarian Simulator
description: Bring your vengeance to the Romans standing hand in hand with the barbaric rebellion raging through the whole Empire. Choose your own style of play in this action adventure game and reclaim the stolen teritorries.

name: Magical Strings
description: Intense multiplayer rhythm-projectile-fighting game set in ancient China!

name: Nebuli
description: Nebuli is a space themed VR FPS. Traverse wormholes on a mission to destroy enemy ships and get high scores.
It's a nice puzzle to move the same numbers next to each other.

name: Play With Gilbert: A Small Tail
description: Play With Gilbert - A Small Tail is a free playable sampler for the game: Play With Gilbert - Remake, which is a third-person sandbox game created for young children (Ages 3+). It encourages curiosity and role-play while helping them become familiarized with 3D games and gameplay.

name: Word Wise
description: Word Wise is designed to be a simple game where you sit back, relax, and make words by selecting tiles. There are nearly half a million words you can make, and over 7 hours of music over 5 genres including Cinematic, Lo-Fi, and Vaporwave. Happy word making!

name: Matts Project Zombies
description: Matts Project Zombies is an intense open world, take down large groups of zombies, bandits, and other monsters. Fight against the Dead. Scavenge for Loot and supplies, Do Quests, Build Bases, PVP! & Reclaim Planet Earth!

name: Bongo Arena
description: A turn-based strategy game where you design the AI commands for your battle units.

name: Hand Simulator: Horror
description: Fear clouds the mind. Fear paralyzes the body. If your hands are shaking with fear, you will remain in this hell forever.

name: Mayor Madness
description: A crazy modern tower defence strategy game

name: Ramses: Rise of Empire
description: Return Egypt to its former glory and win the favor of the gods as you rebuild the ancient civilization from the ground up! From the first hut you build to the last palace you raise, you will turn a broke and barren land into a shining example to the nations!

name: Temper My Blade
description: 100 ways to die to conquer a man. A man who can't be attacked-catch him and lock him up, then conquer him! Jianmang is the main attack, and the scabbard is the main guard. The strong is the supreme. The swordmand is above the scabbard, and the scabbard can only live as a tool.

name: Sweet Holiday Jigsaws: Halloween Night
description: Bright and cozy fully customizable Halloween Jigsaws

name: Marcella Moon: Saboteurs on the River
description: Play as amateur sleuth Marcella Moon to investigate a series of sabotage incidents on the Louisiana bayou.

name: Unicorn Dream
description: Unicorn Dream - runner and side-scroller shooter. You control a comical unicorn that in your dreams flies through various obstacles, dodges vertical lightning, collects dolls of missing children, shoots ice cream and much more that only a unicorn can dream of!

name: CyberTown
description: CyberTown - Is an inter-planetary colonization in which we build new cybernetic cities. Take part in a race war between wild and modified humans. Food disasters and other challenges await you on your way.

name: The Majesti
description: Before there were cities, towns, or even people, magical animals known as Majesti ruled the world. The Majesti is a family-friendly (though intense at times) story-rich JRPG. Play as different animals from the three Majesti factions; herbivore, carnivore, and scavenger.

name: Rescue Team: Planet Savers
description: Rally the Rescue Team to stop a glacial meltdown that could have catastrophic consequences! Are you ready to save the day? The adventure is just a click away!

name: Treasured
description: Are you ready to raid some temples and expand the collection for your museum? Treasured is a co-op, puzzle game that will allow you and your friends to become the ultimate adventurer!

name: The Cat Banny
description: The Cat Banny is a puzzle, a story of a lost cat trapped in a dreams world.

name: The Mystery of Caketropolis
description: A bakery falls to arson and a city falls to chaos. With the harmony between human and dragon crumbling, can Rimentus solve the Mystery of Caketropolis before his kind face exile?

name: Tactical Battle Chronicles: Prelude to a War
description: Tactical Battle Chronicles: Prelude to a war is a turn-based tactical rpg where you control a small group of fighters. Recruit allies and defeat your enemies to drive the bandits off.

name: This Legion Kills
description: Competitive wargaming gets a facelift with fast-paced tactical battles and turn-based strategy, set in in the hilariously brutal, but not so very grim-dark, universe of the future.

name: My Dear Prince
description: A sweet and light yuri story about an airheaded daydreamer and a tomboy set on a quaint Japanese island filled with cute bunnies.

name: Tumbled
description: indie puzzle game, where you tumbled your way to the portal, without missing the platforms.

name: Power of Language
description: Power Of Language is a suspense text game mainly featuring dialogues. The game is about a case caused by a certain mental illness in the future, and you’d act as a hypnotist to talk to prisoners for investigations that eventually lead to the truth.

name: Easter Pairs
description: A game in the classic "memory" genre. The images of eggs are laid out on the playing field, your task is to find paired ones.

name: The Sickle Upon Sekigahara
description: The Sickle Upon Sekigahara is a short Visual Novel that puts the player in the role of Kobayakawa Hideaki in the most tumultuous period of his life.

name: Magic Forms
description: A casual game about forms and colors. Solve the forms puzzles with colors. A new and modern approach gameplay inspired on Rubrik's Cube.

name: Cryospace
description: You are not a soldier. Not a fighter. Just an ordinary maintenance guy. Yet you have to fight. And you are forced to run. But chiefly: you must help the frozen crew survive on a spaceship. You are the only one who can save others. You are made a hero against your will. You become a leader. A slayer.

name: Forge Squad
description: Forge Squad is a cooperative crafting game for up to 4 players. In order to defeat the approaching waves of enemies, runes must be forged. The crafting consists of several steps, which can only be efficiently done together. Enemies can only be injured by towers charged with the right type of runes.

name: Bow & Quiver
description: Jump, smash, and shoot your way through a retro fantasy universe of ye olden times. Collect a myriad coins, bonuses, items, weapons, and ammo types. Speed run your way through a physics-based world of obstacles while grabbing as much power as you can before time expires.

name: Killing Stream
description: Interactive. Immersive. Intriguing. Killing Stream is an FPP movie thriller, where viewers get fully engaged by making decisions for the main character and have a real impact on the story. Try to survive… Killing Stream

name: Wordle 2
description: Wordle 2 is a challenging and addictive word game that will put your vocabulary and spelling skills to the test with exciting new levels and hidden bonus words.

name: Hard Block Girls
description: Getting into a woman's mind can be the hardest puzzle of a life time, but surely your tile-matching skills will make things easier with this gang! Crack the puzzles and help them overcome fears and insecurities. Destroy all the anxiety blocks and free these women from all negative beliefs!

name: Elon Tycoon
description: Elon Tycoon is the best economic strategy game to become the greatest industrial magnate💰 Go from a self-employment in the garage to the industry leader in the world💰 Manage, build and dominate - start your empire today💰💰💰

name: Ghostist
description: A 2D Ghost Hunting Game - Your are a Ghostist investigating a variety of places. Use your ears and smarts to identify the Type of Ghost you are dealing with - but don´t get yourself killed! And once you know what you are dealing with - banish the ghosts!

name: Daenerys Miracle
description: Daenerys in an epic battle against monsters

name: Melatonin
description: Melatonin is a rhythm game about dreams and reality merging together. It uses animations and sound cues to keep you on beat without any intimidating overlays or interfaces. Harmonize through a variety of dreamy levels containing surprising challenges, hand-drawn art, and vibrant music.

name: Emily the Strange: Skate Strange
description:
Emily The Strange: Skate Strange is the latest edition to the ever expanding universe of Emily the Strange - dive into the exciting world of skateboarding and explore over 36 levels located in the picturesque cities of Paris, Moscow, London and New York.

Collect a wide variety of super charged power ups to ride in slow motion, skate upside down or even jump through portals that transport you instantly to a totally different location!

Try out some crazy moves on your skateboard: play air guitar, perform a handstand or the famous 'ollie airwalk'!

The extensive level editor brings endless fun: create your own levels and then skate them!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: Florida
description: Night Environment completely revolutionizes night flying in the FSX: Steam Edition world. Using a series of databases, Night Environment adds brilliant, realistic lighting to your simulator. Hundreds of thousands of lights clearly show how highways connect to cities and how smaller roads meander through neighbourhoods.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft V35B Bonanza
description: Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Beechcraft V35B Bonanza, is a beautifully detailed and accurate aircraft.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Barcelona
description: Barcelona is the capital city of the autonomous community of Catalonia in the Kingdom of Spain, as well as the country's second most populous municipality, with a population of 1.6 million within city limits. Founded as a Roman city, in the Middle Ages Barcelona became the capital of the County of Barcelona.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C208B Grand Caravan
description: Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Cessna C208B Grand Caravan is a hugely detailed and accurate aircraft. It comes in seven paint schemes, features accurate flight dynamics and realistic instruments including autopilot, custom weather radar and an original GNS 430.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Middle East
description: Toposim Middle East for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole Middle East region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Central Africa
description: Toposim Central Africa for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole Central African region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Piper PA-28R Turbo Arrow III/IV
description: Developed by Just Flight, the PA-28R Turbo Arrow III and Arrow IV are four seater, turbocharged piston-engine aircraft equipped with a retractable tricycle landing gear and constant-speed propeller – ideal for touring and instrument training.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - P-51H Mustang
description: The aircraft has been detailed inside and out down to the last rivet and features smooth 3D gauge technology, droppable external fuel tanks, working 3D collimating gun sight and authentically reproduced Merlin engine sounds.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft T-34B Mentor
description: Carenado’s T-34B Mentor for FSX: Steam Edition is a detailed rendition of this aircraft which comes with three paint schemes. Details include pitot pressure chamber, antennas, chocks, and pitot tube cover.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Rockwell AC11 Commander 114
description: Built by Rockwell International, the Commander 114 is a four-seat single-engine aircraft which first flew in the 1970s in its original 112 guise. Further developed with the addition of an updated 260-horsepower engine, the Commander 114 series was introduced in the 1990s and remained in production into the early 2000s.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft C90B King Air
description: Experience stunning visuals to complement the realism and accuracy that you have come to expect from the General Aviation aircraft experts at Carenado. The HD Series C90B King Air has been designed to push the limits of what can be achieved in these simulators and delivers super high quality detail to satisfy even the most demanding...

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - CSA SportCruiser
description: Intitally designed by Czech Aircraft Works and still in production with Czech Sport Aircraft, the CSA SportCruiser is a low-wing two-seat aircraft with a single engine and tricycle undercarriage. Engines up to 120 horsepower can be fitted, giving this light-sport/ultralight aircraft a possible cruising speed of 133mph (214km/h) and a...

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: Pennsylvania
description: Night Environment: Pennsylvania for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C152 II
description: Found in flight schools around the world, the classic Cessna 152 has landed on FSX: Steam Edition.More than 7,500 C152s have been produced, with various options and modifications being introduced by the factory and added by owners over the years. The C152 II variant includes an enhanced standard avionics and navigation package.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft T-34C Turbo Mentor
description: The Beechcraft T-34 Mentor is based on the earlier piston-engine variants produced in the late-1940s. Almost six decades after it was designed, this propeller-driven, single-engine military trainer remains in service, having provided a crucial stepping stone for thousands of student pilots.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Flight Recorder
description: Track your flights in detail with Flight Recorder! Developed by FS-FlightControl, Flight Recorder gives you an accurate play-by-play of your in-sim flights. You can access detailed information such as your indicated and true airspeed, aircraft and ground altitude, vertical speed, and pitch and bank angle.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Approach Training
description: Practice your take-offs and landings with Approach Training! Developed by FS-FlightControl, Approach Training gives you the tools to reposition to a multitude of approach locations in Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft F33A Bonanza
description: Developed by Carenado, the FSX: Steam Edition rendition of the Beechcraft F33A Bonanza, is a highly detailed and accurate aircraft.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Northrop F-89 Scorpion
description: The classic Cold War design of the F-89 Scorpion was the product of a 1945 USAAF specification for a night fighter. The aircraft was to have a crew of two with an offensive armament of six 20mm cannon. The prototype was first flown on August 16, 1948 by test pilot Fred C. Bretcher.
